categories: Category:Stormtrooper officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Stor was a Human male student who attended the Academy of Carida during the Imperial era. During his graduation in 4 BBY, he served as Cadet Company Commander; when his company was marching towards the cliff, he forgot to call halt, and as a result, the first rank fell to their deaths.
Stor later committed suicide by jumping off the same cliff. His death was upheld by the instructors at the Academy as a mark of honor and responsibility.
